name: Druid's Tale
description:
The planet is dying, and only one druid can save it. Are you ready to help her on her mission?

Welcome to Druid's Tale - a pixel-art, casual, grid-based puzzle game that will take you on an epic adventure to save the world! Join our heroine, the red-headed druid, on her mission to collect water droplets and save the trees from dying. With each level, the stakes get higher as the toxic fog slowly creeps up, threatening to end your mission and the planet's survival.

In this game, you will face challenging puzzles and avoid traps as you navigate the grid-based world, finding the water droplets and strategically watering the trees. But be careful! The toxic fog is always closing in, and if it touches the druid, it's GAME OVER. The game features multiple levels, each with unique challenges and obstacles to overcome.

But don't worry, the druid has some tricks up her sleeve! She can collect up to 3 water droplets, which serve as a rating system, challenging players to aim for a perfect score. So, put your puzzle-solving skills and quick reflexes to the test and help the red-headed druid save the planet!

The controls are simple:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to interact with objects

This game is a school project made by a team of university students. Currently still being developed. Feel free to leave feedback and recommendations!
